DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to test the effect of MK-0941 as add-on therapy for participants taking metformin for type 2 diabetes.
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Test MK-0941 in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus With Inadequate Glycemic Control on Metformin (MK-0941-017)
DOC.criteria: Patient has type 2 diabetes mellitus Between the ages of 18 and 70 Patient has a history of type 1 diabetes mellitus or ketoacidosis. Patient is on a weight loss program and is not in the maintenance phase or is taking weight loss medication. Patient has had surgery within 30 days of starting the study or has planned major surgery during the study
